meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Craig Chern Felicia McGowan Stephanie Jass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6453.

td.p: Craig Chern, an assistant principal from Wall Township, New Jersey
Felicia McGowan, an administrative coordinator from Baltimore, Maryland
Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $47,570)

tr.td: 35 YEARS AGO: 1977
YOU KNOW THE RULES!
WORD ORIGINS
TRAVEL TEXAS
IT'S GETTING WARM
SHEDDING THEIR CLOTHES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'With freezing temperatures, this was officially recorded in Miami, Florida for the first time ever')

tr.td: With freezing temperatures, this was officially recorded in Miami, Florida for the first time ever

tr.td: Stephanie
Felicia
Craig
GREAT MEN & WOMEN OF MEDICINE
POP CULTURE BEFORE & AFTER
GEOGRAPH"IA"
(Alex: each correct response will end in the letters I-A.)
THAT BOOK WAS A HORROR!
STOPS
ONE LETTER DIFFERENCE
(Alex: We need two words in your response.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [to Craig] Did you write anything down?)
(Craig: Nothing good.)
(Alex: Nothing good? You said, [*]. And you are right, even--yeah, it looks good.)
FeliciaWho was ?
$1,200
CraigWho was Maxmillian I?
$1,000
StephanieWho was Tsar Nicholas?
$3,000
Maximilian I')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This ruler of a New World country was born in Vienna\'s Schonbrunn Palace in 1832 & executed far from home in 1867')

tr.td: HISTORIC RULERS
This ruler of a New World country was born in Vienna's Schonbrunn Palace in 1832 & executed far from home in 1867
Stephanie
Felicia
Craig
3-day champion: $66,770
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Stephanie
Felicia
Craig

23 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W

9 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)
